metadata.title: CVE-2024-50189 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:HID: amd_sfh: Switch to device-managed dmam_alloc_coherent()Using the device-managed version allows to simplify clean-up in probe()error path.Additionally, this device-managed ensures proper cleanup, which helps toresolve memory errors, page faults, btrfs going read-only, and btrfsdisk corruption.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
